font.p:
I enjoy exploring the spectrum of human emotions through improvising over their isomorphic patterns in musical notes. Here are some of my on-spot improvs I have recorded. I have not done any pre/post processing on them and is as recorded - raw. Hope you enjoy them; let me know what you think of them on Soundcloud. PM if you would like to collaborate/jam with me.
"... And that music is so powerful that it's quite beyond my control and ah
When I'm in the grips of it I don't feel pleasure and I don't feel pain, either physically or emotionally
Do you understand what I'm talking about?
Have you ever felt like that?
When you just couldn't feel anything and you didn't want to either
You know? Like that? Do you understand what I'm saying sir?"
-- Iggy Pop, on Peter Gzowski's 90 Minutes Live (March 1977)
